name: Island Racer (itch)
description:
Initial version has limited playability

Island racer is a freeroam racing game where you complete checkpoint trials

To start a trial drive to any yellow sphere to begin

Controls:

  • WSAD - move
  • L - Toggle lights
  • Left Shift - boost
  • R - put car on wheels (if you are still stuck use "Reset car" from ESC menu)

Objective:

  • Drive through all checkpoints as fast as possible
  • Find shiny collectibles

#MFGJ
